open_soon.subtitle: Trustora secures money and work through automated escrow, legal contracts, and verified professionals.
open_soon.feature_verified_body: No fake accounts. Every user goes through rigorous identity verification.
open_soon.feature_escrow_body: Funds are locked at project start and released only on delivery.
open_soon.feature_contracts_body: Not just a chat. Each project generates a legally binding contract.
